short_summary: This Request for Proposal seeks an independent 3rd Party Commissioning Consultant (CxA) to provide Building Commissioning (Cx) services for the One Building Project
description: The One Building Project involves the Centre Block Rehabilitation, Parliamentary Welcome Centre New Construction and the integration with Centre Block Underground Services (CBUS), Visitor’s Welcome Centre Phase 1, West Block and East Block.
full_summary:
# 3rd Party Commissioning for the One Building Project

## Contract Information

| Field | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS4229928733-Doc4230175278 |
| **Amendment Number** | 5 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4229928733 |
| **Publication Date** | October 31, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | December 13, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST |
| **Amendment Date** | December 8, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | December 18, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | December 18, 2033 |

## Contract Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Proposers to submit a proposal for 3rd party commissioning services for the One Building Project, which includes the Centre Block Rehabilitation, Parliamentary Welcome Centre New Construction, and integration with Centre Block Underground Services (CBUS), Visitor’s Welcome Centre Phase 1, West Block, and East Block.

## Commercial and Financial thresholds

* UNSPSC Code: *72000000*Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services
* *81141805*Building inspection service
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Special Instructions

*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by Wednesday, December 13, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
*   The Request for Proposal process is being issued to satisfy the requirement of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) to require an independent 3rd Party Commissioning Consultant (CxA) to provide Building Commissioning (Cx) services.

## Trade Agreements

Canada is a signatory to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada- Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade
